entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
